title: ECharts treemap series
description: treemap series config. Use in: { series: [{ type: "treemap", ... }] }

sort.description:
If sort in desc order.
Default to be desc. asc has strange effect

clipWindow.description: Size of clipped window when zooming. 'origin' or 'fullscreen'

leafDepth.description:
Nodes on depth from root are regarded as leaves.
Count from zero (zero represents only view root).

zoomToNodeRatio.description:
Be effective when using zoomToNode. Specify the proportion of the
target node area in the view area.

nodeClick.description:
Leaf node click behaviour: 'zoomToNode', 'link', false.
If leafDepth is set and clicking a node which has children but
be on left depth, the behaviour would be changing root. Otherwise
use behaviour defined above.

breadcrumb.description: Props: width, height, top, right, bottom, left, show, emptyItemWidth, itemStyle, emphasis

cursor.description: Cursor when mouse on the elements

dataGroupId.description:
groupId of data. can be used for doing drilldown / up animation
It will be ignored if:
 - groupId is specified in each data
 - encode.itemGroupId is given.

seriesLayoutBy.description:
When dataset is used, seriesLayoutBy specifies whether the column or the row of dataset is mapped to the series
namely, the series is "layout" on columns or rows

labelLine.description: Props: show, showAbove, length, length2, smooth, minTurnAngle, lineStyle

labelLayout.description: Overall label layout option in label layout stage.

stateAnimation.description: Animation config for state transition.. Props: duration, easing, delay

universalTransition.description: If enabled universal transition cross series.

selectedMap.description:
Map of selected data
key is name or index of data.

animationThreshold.description: Disable animation when the number of elements exceeds the threshold

animationDuration.description:
Duration of initialize animation.
Can be a callback to specify duration of each element

animationDelay.description:
Delay of initialize animation
Can be a callback to specify duration of each element

animationDurationUpdate.description:
Delay of data update animation.
Can be a callback to specify duration of each element

animationDelayUpdate.description:
Delay of data update animation.
Can be a callback to specify duration of each element

emphasis.description: Emphasis states. Props: itemStyle, label, upperLabel, focus, blurScope, disabled

select.description: Select states. Props: itemStyle, label, upperLabel, disabled

blur.description: Blur states.. Props: itemStyle, label, upperLabel

itemStyle.description: Props: borderRadius, colorAlpha, colorSaturation, borderColorSaturation, gapWidth, color, opacity, decal, shadowBlur, shadowColor, shadowOffsetX, shadowOffsetY, borderColor, borderWidth, borderType, borderCap, borderJoin, borderDashOffset, borderMiterLimit

label.description: Props: formatter, show, position, distance, rotate, offset, minMargin, overflow, ellipsis, silent, precision, valueAnimation, rich, color, fontStyle, fontWeight, fontFamily, fontSize, align, verticalAlign, baseline, opacity, lineHeight, backgroundColor, borderColor, borderWidth, borderType, borderDashOffset, borderRadius, padding, width, height, textBorderColor, textBorderWidth, textBorderType, textBorderDashOffset, textShadowBlur, textShadowColor, textShadowOffsetX, textShadowOffsetY, tag, shadowBlur, shadowColor, shadowOffsetX, shadowOffsetY

upperLabel.description: Props: formatter, show, position, distance, rotate, offset, minMargin, overflow, ellipsis, silent, precision, valueAnimation, rich, color, fontStyle, fontWeight, fontFamily, fontSize, align, verticalAlign, baseline, opacity, lineHeight, backgroundColor, borderColor, borderWidth, borderType, borderDashOffset, borderRadius, padding, width, height, textBorderColor, textBorderWidth, textBorderType, textBorderDashOffset, textShadowBlur, textShadowColor, textShadowOffsetX, textShadowOffsetY, tag, shadowBlur, shadowColor, shadowOffsetX, shadowOffsetY

roam.description: If enable roam. can be specified 'scale' or 'move'

visualDimension.description: Which dimension will be applied with the visual properties.

visibleMin.description: A node will not be shown when its area size is smaller than this value (unit: px square).

childrenVisibleMin.description: Children will not be shown when area size of a node is smaller than this value (unit: px square).

markArea.description: Props: mainType, precision, data, silent, tooltip, type, id, name, z, zlevel, animation, animationThreshold, animationDuration, animationEasing, animationDelay, animationDurationUpdate, animationEasingUpdate, animationDelayUpdate, itemStyle, label, emphasis, select, blur

markLine.description: Props: mainType, symbol, symbolSize, symbolRotate, symbolOffset, precision, data, silent, tooltip, type, id, name, z, zlevel, animation, animationThreshold, animationDuration, animationEasing, animationDelay, animationDurationUpdate, animationEasingUpdate, animationDelayUpdate, lineStyle, itemStyle, label, emphasis, select, blur

markPoint.description: Props: mainType, precision, data, silent, tooltip, type, id, name, z, zlevel, animation, animationThreshold, animationDuration, animationEasing, animationDelay, animationDurationUpdate, animationEasingUpdate, animationDelayUpdate, symbol, symbolSize, symbolRotate, symbolKeepAspect, symbolOffset, emphasis, select, blur, itemStyle, label

tooltip.description: Props: show, triggerOn, alwaysShowContent, formatter, valueFormatter, position, confine, align, verticalAlign, showDelay, hideDelay, transitionDuration, enterable, backgroundColor, borderColor, borderRadius, borderWidth, shadowBlur, shadowColor, shadowOffsetX, shadowOffsetY, padding, extraCssText, textStyle, trigger
